description:
PlayVS is the leading amateur esports platform in North America. We are the single community where players come together to compete, fans gather to spectate, and coaches manage their programs. We offer an incredible, full-stack esport platform—game integrations, team-building tools, leagues, tournaments, and schedules—and our software products tie everything together into a cohesive experience.

As the Senior Director of Sponsorship Sales, you'll be a driving force behind our revenue generation through strategic partnerships with leading brands. You'll work directly with the VP of Sponsorships to help set the vision, develop winning strategies, and secure deals that propel PlayVS to the forefront of the amateur esports landscape.

Here's What You'll Get To Do:
• Sponsorship Strategy: Partner with the VP of Sponsorships and C-level executives to help develop and execute a comprehensive sponsorship strategy aligned with our PlayVS’ OKRs and vision. Identify new market opportunities and build relationships with key decision-makers at target companies.
• Prospect Identification and Qualification: Proactively research and identify potential corporate sponsors who align with our brand, values, and target audience. Develop a deep understanding of their marketing objectives and tailor partnership proposals accordingly.
• Proposal Development and Negotiation: Craft compelling and data-driven sponsorship proposals that showcase the unique value proposition of partnering with PlayVS. Negotiate win-win agreements that secure optimal revenue and mutual benefit.
• Financial Performance and Reporting: Track key performance indicators (KPIs) related to sponsorship activity, analyze data to measure campaign effectiveness, and generate insightful reports for internal stakeholders, including the PlayVS Leadership team.
• Industry Expertise: Stay ahead of the curve in the evolving esports landscape and emerging trends in corporate sponsorship. Continuously identify new and innovative ways to leverage our platform for sponsor benefit.
• Cross-functional Alignment: Work cross-functionally with leaders across Scholastic, Customer Experience, Product, Live Operations, and Marketing teams to foster internal alignment and provide a robust experience for sponsors.

Here's What We're Looking For:
• BA/BS degree or equivalent.
• 10+ years of experience in B2B sales or sponsorship, with a proven track record of success in a fast-paced environment.
• Excellent communication, presentation, and negotiation skills, with the ability to tailor messaging to different audiences.
• Data-driven decision-making skills and experience with analyzing complex data sets.
• Excellent ability to identify, cultivate, and close sponsorship deals.
• Expert ability to manage complex projects with input from cross-functional teams and company leaders.

Bonus points for:
• Passion for esports and a genuine interest in supporting the growth of amateur players.
• Esports and gaming industry experience.

$175,000 - $195,000 a year
PlayVS is proud to be a remote-first company where employees can work almost anywhere within the United States. We have a simple and transparent remote-first level-based compensation structure. The salary range for this full-time remote position is $175,000 - $195,000, plus a very competitive variable compensation, equity, and comprehensive benefits. Compensation details listed in this posting reflect the base salary only and do not include bonus, equity, or sales incentives, if applicable. Our salary ranges are determined by role and level. The range displayed on each job posting reflects the minimum and maximum target for new hire base salaries for the position across all US locations. Within the range, individual pay is determined by several factors, including job-related skills, experience, and relevant education or training.

PlayVS cares about you and your overall well-being, and that’s why we offer a comprehensive benefits package for full-time employees that includes but is not limited to the following:
• healthcare benefits (medical, dental, vision),
• 401(k) plan,
• wellbeing benefits (including Headspace, Omada, and Gympass),
• flexible paid time off,
• volunteer time off,
• paid parental leave,
• several paid holidays,
• learning and development programs (including Liinkedin Learning and Mineral memberships),
• monthly mobile, wellness, and internet stipends!

PlayVS is an equal opportunity employer and is proud to be a majority minority company. We provide equal employment opportunities and are committed to maintaining an inclusive environment for our customers, employees, and applicants. We prohibit discrimination and harassment of any type regardless of race, color, religion, age, sex (including pregnancy and gender identity), national origin, disability status, genetics, protected veteran status, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, parental status, or any other characteristic protected by federal, state or local laws.

If you have a disability or special need that requires an accommodation, please contact us at accommodations@playvs.com
